name: Wizard's Gold
overview: Wizard's Gold is a text adventure game for the 8-bit Atari. The player begins their adventure within the bedroom of a wizard's house, with the goal to find a hidden bar of gold within the dark catacombs beneath his home. The player must explore a variety of rooms, including: the broom repair room, a psychedelic room, an aquarium, and a fungus room. All commands are via VERB NOUN entry. The player can ask for help at any time to get advice on specific areas. There is no save or restore feature.
